version_description:
Major update:
- Added support for many new map datums (including NAD27, OSGB36, AGD66, ED50).
- Added full support for Ordnance Survey National Grid coordinates (including map grid overlay).
- Improved flexibility of datum and location format selection - define up to 3 datum/location format pairs and use to enter waypoints.
- Overhauled location entry - should now be easier and faster to enter coordinates
- New location formats - OSNG, USNG, MGRS-Old formats added.
- Added option to disable compass calibration screen.
- Added latitude/longitude map grid overlay
- Last used waypoint colour is remembered and applied to new waypoints.
- Added warning/what's new splash screen (shows once for each new version only) 
- Removed annoying automatic rating prompts (but please rate MilGPS from the settings menu if you like it!)
- Dropped iOS7 support

Major update:
- Added support for many new map datums (including NAD27, OSGB36, AGD66, ED50).
- Added full support for Ordnance Survey National Grid coordinates (including map grid overlay).
- Improved flexibility of datum and location format selection - define up to 3 datum/location format pairs and use to enter waypoints.
- Overhauled location entry - should now be easier and faster to enter coordinates
- New location formats - OSNG, USNG, MGRS-Old formats added.
- Added option to disable compass calibration screen.
- Added latitude/longitude map grid overlay
- Last used waypoint colour is remembered and applied to new waypoints.
- Added warning/what's new splash screen (shows once for each new version only) 
- Removed annoying automatic rating prompts (but please rate MilGPS from the settings menu if you like it!)
- Dropped iOS7 support

Minor bugfixes.
Dropped support for iOS 8.

- Added a new north diagram screen that shows magnetic declination and grid-magnetic angle for a waypoint. You can view it from the waypoint detail screen.
- Bugfixes.

- create waypoints by specifying distance and direction from another location (on map screen)
- bug fixes

- Under the hood upgrades and enhancements.
- Added analytics on an opt-in basis. Please consider enabling analytics, the information collected will be used to improve the app.
- Bug fixes.

- Added landscape orientation support. If you have customized your location/navigation screens you can now customize portrait and landscape modes independently.
- Added iPad support. Only WiFi + Cellular models are supported - WiFi only models do not have a GPS receiver in them.
- New app icon.
- Bug fixes and optimizations.

- Added yards/miles distance format.
- Minor UI tweaks.
- Bug fixes and optimizations.

Fixed a bug that could prevent map waypoints being selected when tapped.
Fixed a bug that could result in the compass appearing in the wrong position on the navigate screen.

- Rewrite of mapping functionality to enable new maps in the future.
- Updated map screen user interface.
- Added scale to map (ruler or rings).
- Added ruler tool to map.
- Added destination line to map.
- Added off screen indicator for current location, destination and selected waypoint to map.
- Bug fixes and performance improvements.

v6.5.1
This update fixes a bug in v6.5.0 on iPhone X, XS, XS Max and XR devices where waypoints on the map may not appear in the correct location. v6.5.0 has only been pushed to a small number of users and those users are advised to double check the location of any waypoints created using that version. Earlier versions of the app and other devices are not affected.

v6.5.0
- Rewrite of mapping functionality to enable new maps in the future.
- Updated map screen user interface.
- Added scale to map (ruler or rings).
- Added ruler tool to map.
- Added destination line to map.
- Added off screen indicator for current location, destination and selected waypoint to map.
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

- The destination waypoint is now persisted across app launches.
- Added option to open a waypoint in external apps for driving directions.
- Extended map to edges of screen on all devices.
- Grid labels now appear for a greater range of map headings.
- Bug fixes and performance improvements.

- Revamped waypoint import/export flow.
- Added support for import/export of waypoints in CSV and KML format (KML point placemarks only).
- File exports now have precision of 5 decimal places (~1m), 1m precision for altitude.
- Bug fixes and performance improvements.

- Updated for iOS 13.
- Added metres per second speed unit.
- Added ISO8601 ordinal date format.
- Bug fixes and performance improvements.
